Title: Galavant
Actors: Joshua Sasse, Timothy Omundson, Vinnie Jones, Mallory Jansen
Plot: The adventures of Galavant, a dashing hero who is determined to reclaim his reputation and his "Happily Ever After" by going after the evil King Richard, who ruined it the moment he stole the love of Galavant's life, Madalena.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 3 nominations.
